result.email_subject: Large Fruit or Veggie Juice - Only $5!
result.name: Large Fruit or Veggie Juice
result.description: Whether you're into fruits of fancy or prefer to get revved-up by veggies, there's something for everyone with the range of juices made from carefully selected quality ingredients at Top Juice. The centrifugal juicing process delivers a super-healthy energy boost for you to savour as you go about your day, so the next time you're in need of a pick-me-up, go straight for the Top!
result.inclusions: One large fruit or veggie juice only
result.whats_included:
- One large fruit or veggie juice
- Valid for one person - Printed voucher must be presented in-store
- Available from 75 Top Juice locations - [see your nearest outlet here](http://topjuice.com.au/locations/)

result.how_to_redeem: No bookings required - You must present your PRINTED voucher only on arrival to redeem. Phone vouchers will not be accepted. PRINTED VOUCHERS ONLY.

fine_print.title: Inclusions
fine_print.body: One large fruit or veggie juice only

fine_print.title: Conditions of the Deal
fine_print.body: Valid from Monday 3 September 2018. Menu items are subject to change. Limit of five vouchers may be purchased for personal use; five vouchers may be purchased as gifts. Maximum of one voucher redeemable per visit. Voucher valid for one person. Vouchers for this offer are limited and subject to availability. Not valid with any other offer. Full terms and conditions are located on the terms and conditions page of our website.

result.vendor_description: Looking for a refreshing thirst-quencher or a daily dose of vitamins on the go? Look no further than today's nutritious offer from Top Juice, the go-to name when it comes to healthy beverages! Head to any of their 75 stores!
result.section_content:
- Minty Mix: Mint, spinach, celery, apple
- Purple Power: Beetroot, carrot, watermelon
- Ruby Green: Ruby grapefruit, carrot, celery, beetroot, ginger
- Easy Tropical: Pineapple, mango, banana, apple
- Berry Delight: Strawberry, cranberry, pear, apple 
- Happy Juice: Rockmelon, strawberry, pear
- [See the full range of juices here](http://topjuice.com.au/menu/drinks/)
